Context: After monoassociation, EcN was detected in spleens and livers of TLR4−/− and CD14−/− but not wildtype mice.
In contrast to wildtype (WT) mice, EcN monoassociation resulted in increased bacterial invasion in TLR4−/− mice to liver and spleen 3 days after inoculation (Fig. 1a).
